title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official Go CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration that wraps Ollama’s chat, generate, and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that clones ChatGPT look-and-feel; runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder-style API with POJO mapping and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt templates, conversation history, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and built-in model cache.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF Q&A, function-calling, voice chat, model fine-tuning, and more.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension that adds an “Ask Ollama” sidebar and editor commands.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client published to npm with both callback and promise APIs.

title: ollama-kt
summary: Multiplatform Kotlin SDK for Ollama targeting JVM, Android, and native via Ktor client.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and llama.cpp for vector search.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels via mentions or shortcuts.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift package that wraps Ollama REST endpoints for macOS/iOS apps using URLSession.
